pkgmetadata.longdescription: Superadmin=====Superadmin is a Django app based in django admin to build admin sites quickly and easily, and generate site page like django admin.Detailed documentation is in the "docs" directory.Quick start-----------1. Add "superadmin" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'superadmin', ]3. Run ``python manage.py migrate`` to create the superadmin migrations.4. Continue
